title: The Widower Ep. 3: The Trial
description: Thomas Randolph strikes back against his accusers in exclusive jailhouse interviews. His trial features revealing and testimony from his accusers, an emotional verdict, and a surprising twist.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
